name: Dog
petDescription: Loyal and playful companion, known as “man’s best friend.

name: Cat
petDescription: Independent and curious, enjoys cozy spaces and naps.

name: Hamster
petDescription: Small and active pet, often kept in cages with wheels.

name: Rabbit
petDescription: Gentle and social, loves vegetables and hopping around.

name: Turtle
petDescription: Calm and long-lived, recognized for their hard shells.

name: Parrot
petDescription: Colorful and intelligent, some can mimic human speech.
